alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 11:47PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gove County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Gove, moving east at 25 mph. The storm will impact the southeast portion of Gove county. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Gove County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west central Kansas.
